param.name: type_fasta
param.label: Select the type of fasta used

param.name: compression
param.label: Compression
param.help: Memory/runtime scale like 1/c; higher c is faster but less sensitive at low coverage. The -c for genomes must be than >= the -c for reads (strict > is allowed) (-c)

param.name: grouped_genomes
param.label: Creating a database of contigs or if genomes are all in one fasta file
param.help: Considers every record in a fasta (i.e. contig) as a genome (-i)
